name: google-drive-mcp-server-extension
description: The Google Drive MCP server provides a suite of tools for managing files and folders within Google Drive.

tools.name: list_files
tools.description: List available files from user's Google Drive account.

tools.name: create_file
tools.description: Create a new file in the specified folder in user's Google Drive account.

tools.name: fetch_file_content
tools.description: Fetch content of a file from user's Google Drive account.

tools.name: fetch_file_metadata
tools.description: Fetch metadata of a file from user's Google Drive account.

tools.name: update_file_metadata
tools.description: Update metadata of a file in user's Google Drive account.

tools.name: copy_file
tools.description: Create copy of an existing file in user's Google Drive account.

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Delete a file from user's Google Drive account.

tools.name: empty_trash
tools.description: Empty the trash in user's Google Drive account.

oauth_credentials.title: Google OAuth 2.0 Credentials
oauth_credentials.description: Path to the credentials.json file downloaded from the Google Cloud Console for OAuth 2.0 authentication.
